snippet.title: Resident Fear : Redistribution | The Official Trailer
snippet.description: The time has come to fight back against the undead menace. Take up arms and join the fight to purge the infected in Resident Fear : Redistribution, the terrifying new survival horror title from Gamesoft Studio. Watch the official trailer now and get a glimpse at the nightmare that awaits - eerie abandoned streets filled with shambling undead horrors, mysterious corporations concealing dark secrets and a city on the brink of destruction. Choose your weapons, barricade your safehouses and survive if you can. But remember, there is no rescue comingnly redistribution. The official release date is fast approaching. Stay vigilant and we'll see you inside. The horror begins soon.
